original_text: This is what it means to trust God: We will be sure about the things that we hope for. We will be sure in our minds about things that we cannot even see.
korean_text: 믿음은 바라는 것들의 실상이요 보이지 않는 것들의 증거니

sentences.original_text: This is what it means to trust God:
We will be sure about the things
We will be sure in our minds
about things that we cannot even see.
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 전혀 볼 수 없는 것들에 대해
